content:
Here is a suggestion for the layout of the Datasets (Data Management) screen:

1. Top Navigation Bar: Contains the logo, page title, user menu, and other global navigation elements.
2. Left Sidebar: Contains any filters or search tools for the dataset list.
3. Main Content Area: Contains the list of datasets, with columns for the dataset name, upload date, and status.
4. Right Sidebar: Contains any additional tools or controls related to managing the datasets.
5. Bottom Navigation Bar: Contains any pagination controls or other tools for navigating the dataset list.

This layout allows users to easily view and manage the datasets in the system, and provides clear separation between the different areas of the screen. It is designed to be scalable, so that it can accommodate a large number of datasets without feeling cluttered or overwhelming.

Here is a suggestion for the layout of the Tasks (Admin, Tagger, Checker View) screen:

1. Top Navigation Bar: Contains the logo, page title, user menu, and other global navigation elements.
2. Left Sidebar: Contains any filters or search tools for the task list.
3. Main Content Area: Contains the list of tasks, with columns for the task name, assigned user, and status.
4. Right Sidebar: Contains any additional tools or controls related to managing the tasks.
5. Bottom Navigation Bar: Contains any pagination controls or other tools for navigating the task list.

This layout allows users to easily view and manage the tasks in the system, and provides clear separation between the different areas of the screen. It is designed to be scalable, so that it can accommodate a large number of tasks without feeling cluttered or overwhelming.
